# SpeechDetector.Result

**Structure**

A result from the speech detector. Please note, these must be enabled via [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechDetector/init(detectionOptions:reportResults:)] and currently only support error handling from the VAD model.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Result
```

## Getting detection results

- **speechDetected**

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SpeechModuleResult
title: SpeechDetector.Result
